original_text: The king told the Levites to stand in the Lord's temple with their cymbals, harps and lyres to make music. They stood at the places where King David, David's prophet Gad and the prophet Nathan had told the Levites to stand. This was the Lord's command that he had given to his prophets.
korean_text: 왕이 레위 사람들을 여호와의 전에 두어서 다윗과 왕의 선견자 갓과 선지자 나단이 명령한 대로 제금과 비파와 수금을 잡게 하니 이는 여호와께서 그의 선지자들로 이렇게 명령하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: The king told the Levites to stand in the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 레위 사람들에게 주의 성전에 서라고 명령했다

sentences.original_text: with their cymbals, harps and lyres
where King David, David's prophet Gad and the prophet Nathan had told the Levites to stand
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕, 다윗의 선지자 갓과 선지자 나단이 레위 사람들에게 서라고 말했던 곳에

sentences.original_text: that he had given to his prophets
